scripts.backend:dev: cd apps/express-api && npx tsc -p tsconfig.app.json && node dist/main.js
scripts.mcp:dev: cd apps/mcp-ai-service && npx tsc -p tsconfig.json && MCP_PORT=3001 node dist/main.js
scripts.dev:all:with-mcp: concurrently "npm run backend:dev" "npm run frontend:dev" "npm run mcp:dev"
scripts.help:
echo 'Available scripts:

Backend:
  npm run backend:build         - Compile backend TypeScript
  npm run backend:start         - Start backend (requires build first)
  npm run backend:dev           - Build and start backend
  npm run backend:type-check    - Check backend TypeScript types

Frontend:
  npm run frontend:dev          - Start frontend dev server (requires Node 20+)
  npm run frontend:build        - Build frontend for production
  npm run frontend:type-check   - Check frontend TypeScript types

MCP AI Service:
  npm run mcp:build             - Compile MCP service TypeScript
  npm run mcp:dev               - Build and start MCP service on port 3001
  npm run mcp:type-check        - Check MCP service TypeScript types

Combined:
  npm run start                 - Start backend API
  npm run dev                   - Start backend API (alias)
  npm run dev:all               - Run BOTH backend AND frontend ‚≠ê
  npm run dev:all:with-mcp      - Run backend, frontend, AND MCP service üöÄ
  npm run help                  - Show this help message'
